extension.valueString: Because alcohol use can affect many areas of health and may interfere with certain medications, it is important for us to know how much you usually drink and whether you have experienced any problems or consequences as a result of your drinking.

item.text: Do you sometimes drink beer, wine, or other alcoholic beverages?

extension.valueMarkdown: Display instructions and the standard drink size graphic
Step 2: Consider WHOAUDIT-C Screening  \nDisplay Question #1 of the WHOAUDIT-C

item.text: How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?
How many drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day when drinking?
How often do you have X (5 for men; 4 for women and men over 65) or more drinks on one occasion?
How often during the last year have you found that you were not able to stop drinking once you had started?

valueCoding.display: Daily or almost daily or almost daily

item.text: How often during the last year have you failed to do what was normally expected of you because of drinking?

valueCoding.display: Daily or almost daily or almost daily

item.text: How often during the last year have you needed a first drink in the morning to get yourself going after a heavy drinking session?

valueCoding.display: Daily or almost daily or almost daily

item.text: How often during the last year have you had a feeling of guilt or remorse after drinking?

valueCoding.display: Daily or almost daily or almost daily

item.text: How often during the last year have you been unable to remember what happened the night before because you had been drinking?

valueCoding.display: Daily or almost daily or almost daily

item.text: Have you or someone else been injured as a result of your drinking?

valueCoding.display: Yes, but not in the last year

item.text: Has a relative or friend, doctor or other health worker been concerned about your drinking or suggested you cut down?

valueCoding.display: Yes, but not in the last year

item.text: Are you pregnant or trying to be become pregnant?
